articles.title: Runway releases its first world model, adds native audio to latest video model - TechCrunch
articles.description: Runway debuts a physics-aware world model that simulates reality to train agents and power video, robotics, and avatar applications.
articles.content: The race to release world models is on as AI image and video generation company Runway joins an increasing number of startups and BigTech companies by launching its first one. Dubbed GWM-1, the model… [+3552 chars]

articles.author: Harish Jonnalagadda
articles.title: I went hands-on with the Galaxy Z TriFold at Dubai Mall — Samsung's tri-fold has a distinct advantage over the Huawei Mate XT, and the design is much better than I expected - Android Central
articles.description: It costs an absurd amount of money, but the Galaxy Z TriFold isn't just a tech demo — this is a tablet-sized foldable you can actually use.
articles.content: The next innovation in the phone industry is tri-folding devices, and Samsung is unveiling its efforts in this category with the Galaxy Z TriFold, which is slated to hit the U.S. in Q1 2026. While Sa… [+5920 chars]
